plot: Millionaire's son is kidnapped and hidden inside a circus in town. The boy's sister asks three clowns to help her find him.
title: Os três Palhaços e o Menino
plot_es: Millionaire's son is kidnapped and hidden inside a circus in town. The boy's sister asks three clowns to help her find him.
original_name: Os três Palhaços e o Menino
plot_en: Millionaire's son is kidnapped and hidden inside a circus in town. The boy's sister asks three clowns to help her find him.
